channel.title: Diego Rayo | Software Developer
channel.description: Hi, I'm Diego, a Software Developer. I have over 6 years of experience developing Web Solutions. I usually work using JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and GraphQL.

item.title: Viajesito en Colombia
item.description: Este es un breve resumen acerca de mis primeras vacaciones como "joven adulto" por Colombia.
item.content:encoded: Este es un breve resumen acerca de mis primeras vacaciones como "joven adulto" por Colombia.
item.author: diegofrayo@gmail.com (Diego Rayo)

item.title: Publishing a npm private package to GitHub pakages using GitHub actions
item.description: In this tutorial I want to explain how to publish a private npm package to GitHub packages using GitHub Actions.
item.content:encoded: In this tutorial I want to explain how to publish a private npm package to GitHub packages using GitHub Actions.
item.author: diegofrayo@gmail.com (Diego Rayo)

item.title: My favorite music and MDX
item.description: MDX is a Markdown language enhancement, making it more powerful and customizable, because MDX allows rendering React components inside of Markdown files. Spotify just created a playlist with the most listened songs by me during this 2020, so, I took this opportunity to write a tutorial about MDX and Next.js
item.content:encoded: MDX is a Markdown language enhancement, making it more powerful and customizable, because MDX allows rendering React components inside of Markdown files. Spotify just created a playlist with the most listened songs by me during this 2020, so, I took this opportunity to write a tutorial about MDX and Next.js
item.author: diegofrayo@gmail.com (Diego Rayo)

item.title: Connecting a Firebase project with a Go Daddy domain
item.description: In this tutorial I want to explain how to connect a Go Daddy domain with a Firebase project.
item.content:encoded: In this tutorial I want to explain how to connect a Go Daddy domain with a Firebase project.
